name: DenseMatrix_Float
desc: A structure that contains a dense matrix of single-precision, floating-point values.

items.name: init(rowCount: Int32, columnCount: Int32, columnStride: Int32, attributes: SparseAttributes_t, data: UnsafeMutablePointer<Float>)
items.desc: Creates a new matrix of single-precision values.

items.name: var rowCount: Int32
items.desc: The number of rows in the matrix.

items.name: var columnCount: Int32
items.desc: The number of columns in the matrix.

items.name: var columnStride: Int32
items.desc: The stride between matrix columns, in elements.

items.name: var attributes: SparseAttributes_t
items.desc: The attributes of the matrix, such as whether itâ€™s symmetrical or triangular.

items.name: struct SparseAttributes_t
items.desc: A structure that represents the attributes of a matrix.

items.name: var data: UnsafeMutablePointer<Float>
items.desc: The array of single-precision, floating-point values in column-major order.
